languages.text: "Вы подписали нам смертный приговор". {n}Гнев на лице астропата, кажется, воспламеняет самый его потусторонний взгляд, прожигающий вас насквозь. Впрочем, гримаса ярости скоро спадает с его лица. Голос Заккари обдает вас холодком.{/n} "Что ж, Ваша Светлость... Ведите свою ведьму".

traits.locale_text: "Вы подписали нам смертный приговор". {n}Гнев на лице астропата, кажется, воспламеняет самый его потусторонний взгляд, прожигающий вас насквозь. Впрочем, гримаса ярости скоро спадает с его лица. Голос Заккари обдает вас холодком.{/n} "Что ж, Ваша Светлость... Ведите свою ведьму".

languages.text: "You have signed our death sentence." {n}Weisz's anger almost seems to ignite his otherworldly gaze, making it burn right through you. However, his face does not stay contorted with fury for long. There is a distinct coldness to his voice as he says,{/n} "Well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Bring your witch here."
languages.original_text: "Вы подписали нам смертный приговор". {n}Гнев на лице астропата, кажется, воспламеняет самый его потусторонний взгляд, прожигающий вас насквозь. Впрочем, гримаса ярости скоро спадает с его лица. Голос Заккари обдает вас холодком.{/n} "Что ж, Ваша Светлость... Ведите свою ведьму".

traits.locale_text: "You have signed our death sentence." {n}The anger in the astropath's face almost seems to ignite his otherworldly gaze, making it burn right through you. However, his face doesn't stay contorted with fury for long. There's a distinct coldness to Zacchary's voice.{/n} "Well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Bring your witch here."

However, his face doesn't stay contorted with fury for long. There's a distinct coldness to Zacchary's voice.{/n} "Well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Bring your witch here."

There is a distinct coldness to his voice as he says,{/n} "Well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Bring your witch here."

"You have signed our death sentence." {n}Weisz's anger almost seems to ignite his otherworldly gaze, making it burn right through you. However, his face does not stay contorted with fury for long. There is a distinct coldness to his voice as he says,{/n} "Well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Bring your witch here."

languages.text: «Acaba de firmar su propia sentencia de muerte». {n}La furia de Weisz parece encender su mirada sobrenatural, haciendo que te queme. Sin embargo, su rostro no pasa mucho tiempo contorsionado en una expresión iracunda. Con frialdad, añade:{/n} «Bueno, mi{mf|lord|lady}... Traiga aquí a su bruja».
languages.original_text: "You have signed our death sentence." {n}Weisz's anger almost seems to ignite his otherworldly gaze, making it burn right through you. However, his face does not stay contorted with fury for long. There is a distinct coldness to his voice as he says,{/n} "Well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Bring your witch here."

traits.locale_text: «Acaba de firmar su propia sentencia de muerte». {n}La furia de Weisz parece encender su mirada sobrenatural, haciendo que te queme. Sin embargo, su rostro no pasa mucho tiempo contorsionado en una expresión iracunda. Con frialdad, añade:{/n} «Bueno, mi{mf|lord|lady}... Traiga aquí a su bruja».

languages.text: 「死刑宣告だな」{n}ワイズの怒りは、まるでこの世のものとは思えない鋭い視線に火をつけて、こちらを焼き尽くすかのようだった。しかし、その怒りに歪んだ顔もしばらくしてスッと消える。口を開いたその声には、ハッキリとした冷たさがあった。{/n}「では、陛下…あなたの魔女をここに連れてくるといい」
languages.original_text: "You have signed our death sentence." {n}Weisz's anger almost seems to ignite his otherworldly gaze, making it burn right through you. However, his face does not stay contorted with fury for long. There is a distinct coldness to his voice as he says,{/n} "Well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Bring your witch here."

traits.locale_text: 「死刑宣告だな」{n}ワイズの怒りは、まるでこの世のものとは思えない鋭い視線に火をつけて、こちらを焼き尽くすかのようだった。しかし、その怒りに歪んだ顔もしばらくしてスッと消える。口を開いたその声には、ハッキリとした冷たさがあった。{/n}「では、陛下…あなたの魔女をここに連れてくるといい」

languages.text: “您这是亲手宣判了我们的死刑。”{n}威茨的语气中带着怒火。他的目光几乎带着烈焰，笔直地穿透了你。不过，他的愤怒并没有持续太久。很快，他再次开了口，语气中带着极其明显的冷漠。{/n}“很好，大人……把您的女巫带过来吧。”
languages.original_text: "You have signed our death sentence." {n}Weisz's anger almost seems to ignite his otherworldly gaze, making it burn right through you. However, his face does not stay contorted with fury for long. There is a distinct coldness to his voice as he says,{/n} "Well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Bring your witch here."

traits.locale_text: “您这是亲手宣判了我们的死刑。”{n}威茨的语气中带着怒火。他的目光几乎带着烈焰，笔直地穿透了你。不过，他的愤怒并没有持续太久。很快，他再次开了口，语气中带着极其明显的冷漠。{/n}“很好，大人……把您的女巫带过来吧。”

languages.text: "Ihr habt unser Todesurteil unterzeichnet." {n}Weisz' Zorn scheint seinen andersweltlichen Blick fast zu entzünden, er brennt förmlich durch dich hindurch. Sein Gesicht bleibt jedoch nicht lange wutverzerrt. Mit auffällig kalter Stimme sagt er:{/n} "Nun, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Bringt Eure Hexe her."
languages.original_text: "You have signed our death sentence." {n}Weisz's anger almost seems to ignite his otherworldly gaze, making it burn right through you. However, his face does not stay contorted with fury for long. There is a distinct coldness to his voice as he says,{/n} "Well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Bring your witch here."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt unser Todesurteil unterzeichnet." {n}Weisz' Zorn scheint seinen andersweltlichen Blick fast zu entzünden, er brennt förmlich durch dich hindurch. Sein Gesicht bleibt jedoch nicht lange wutverzerrt. Mit auffällig kalter Stimme sagt er:{/n} "Nun, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Bringt Eure Hexe her."

languages.text: « Vous venez de signer notre arrêt de mort. » {n}Pour un peu, vous sentiriez jusque dans vos chairs la brûlure du regard surnaturel de Weisz, embrasé par la colère. Cependant, la grimace de fureur qui déforme ses traits disparaît rapidement et il reprend la parole d'une voix glaciale :{/n} « Soit, Votre Seigneurie... Faites donc venir votre sorcière. »
languages.original_text: "You have signed our death sentence." {n}Weisz's anger almost seems to ignite his otherworldly gaze, making it burn right through you. However, his face does not stay contorted with fury for long. There is a distinct coldness to his voice as he says,{/n} "Well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Bring your witch here."

traits.locale_text: « Vous venez de signer notre arrêt de mort. » {n}Pour un peu, vous sentiriez jusque dans vos chairs la brûlure du regard surnaturel de Weisz, embrasé par la colère. Cependant, la grimace de fureur qui déforme ses traits disparaît rapidement et il reprend la parole d'une voix glaciale :{/n} « Soit, Votre Seigneurie... Faites donc venir votre sorcière. »

languages.text: "Hepimizi ölüme mahkûm ettiniz." {n}Weisz'ın öfkesi, seni yakıp geçen uhtevi bakışlarını âdeta alevlendirecek gibi duruyor. Ancak öfkeyle buruşan yüzü, bu ifadeyi uzun süre korumuyor. Konuşmaya başladığında sesinde soğukluk olduğu aşikâr.{/n} "Pekâlâ {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Cadınızı getirin."
languages.original_text: "You have signed our death sentence." {n}Weisz's anger almost seems to ignite his otherworldly gaze, making it burn right through you. However, his face does not stay contorted with fury for long. There is a distinct coldness to his voice as he says,{/n} "Well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Bring your witch here."
